projDesc: LegalComet's services aims to aid lawyers, investigators and corporate professionals to extract and review data through eDiscovery, analytics and artificial intelligence.
It was my 1st project on UI designing during my internship, and picked up on Google SEO when implementing the final website.

The main website of Rajah & Tann Technologies, a company which provides legal technology solutions. The website provides an overview of services and solutions offered, and allow for potential clients to enquire through the contact form provided.
Novusdemia is the eLearning platform created by Rajah & Tann Technologies, to aid in employees learning of cyber-hygiene practices as well as compliance and audit reporting.
Being a new service, I had to constantly review the design and content with key stakeholders to ensure satisfaction before final implementation.
My team created a prototype with the Flutter framework, APIs and more, to tackle the problems of subscription fatigue, which lead us to become the winning team of the hackathon.
My 1st ever portfolio/ resume website. I decided to embark on building a website from scratch as a side project during the Summer of 2020, to sharpen UI design and my frontend skills.
This will also be a platform to post other upcoming projects I have planned to develop with other languages and framework I aim to pickup over the long break.
